ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
You know everything you need to know. Be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要知道的已经都告诉你了。行动吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the assistance, doc. Time for us to go take out Motor-Runner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的协助，医生。咱们该去干掉轰鸣恶煞了吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need? I have a job to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么事？我还有活要干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to take out Motor-Runner when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好去干掉轰鸣恶煞了，就等你一句话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really don't want to start trouble in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好别在这儿惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [001183A3] (file) NPC : Van Graff Guard [060010A1] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's it going?
Hello
Keep moving.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836F] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839A] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839B] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [001183A3] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836E] (file) NPC : Van Graff Guard [060010A1] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a problem?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836F] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839A] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839B] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [001183A3] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836E] (file) NPC : Van Graff Guard [060010A1] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're watching you. Closely.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836F] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839A] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011839B] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [001183A3] (file) NPC : Van Graff Thug [0011836E] (file) NPC : Van Graff Guard [060010A1] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
For the Brotherhood.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Comment (NAM2) : through gritted teeth, mostly to herself EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Follow Protocol::Wait>
Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Follow Distance::Far>
I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Weapon Type::Ranged>
Switch to a melee weapon.
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Weapon Type::Melee>
Let's get going.
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Follow Protocol::Reinitiate>
I think we should travel together.
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Companion Protocol->Conflict::Rex>
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Companion Protocol::Begin>
Those thieves had some gall, stealing from a museum dedicated to romanticizing a couple of criminals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小偷真是厚颜无耻，他们居然敢从雌雄大盗的博物馆里偷东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make sure the gun ends up back on display. I thank you, Primm thanks you, and I do believe Vance'd thank you, if he could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把枪重新放回陈列箱里的。谢谢，我代表普瑞姆感谢您，我相信万斯若是泉下有知，也一定会感谢您的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found the gun. Here it is.
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Companion Protocol::Continue Companion Protocol>
Yes, I'm sure.
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Companion Protocol::End Companion Protocol>
I convinced Pauline that you shouldn't go through with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说服了宝琳，她也觉得应该收手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh, thank god! I love that woman, but I swear this time she was gonna get us killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？哦，感谢上帝！我爱那女人，但她这一次真的差点害死我们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gun's in the safe. The combination's 05-23-34. Take it far away from here, before she changes her mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪在保险箱里。密码是05-23-34。在她改变主意之前，带着枪赶紧走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pauline says you should give me the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝琳说你应该把枪给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the assistance taking out Motor-Runner. I'll be heading back to McCarran. I'll put in a good word for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你干掉了轰鸣恶煞。等我回到麦卡伦，一定会好好宣传你的事迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right here. <Give McCaffery's hat>
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿呢。 <交出麦卡弗里的帽子>

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is great news. No one screws with the Garret Twins and gets away with it. I need to find a place on the wall for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太振奋人心了。敢戏弄加勒特兄妹的人是绝不会有好下场的。我得找个地方把它挂起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for your reward... Here's 150 caps. I trust there were also some valuables on McCaffery. Also, we would like to set you up with a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你的奖励……这是150个瓶盖。麦卡弗里身上应该也有些值钱的东西。另外，我们会给你安排一间房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's. Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拐角处的那间房免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。既然他死了，我们很乐意把它交给你。谢谢你帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm unable to work out a deal. The Great Khans are all yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法达成协议，大汗帮的人归你处置了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was worth a try. I'll have to proceed with the attack as ordered, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经尽力了。那么我只能依照命令开始强攻了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. I'm on it.
Really? Oh, I wasn't expecting you to agree so easily. That's great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？哦，没想到你这么容易就答应了。真是太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It'll allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Aggression Level::Aggressive>
<Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Aggression Level::Aggressive>
All right. I'll do it.
Great. I'll have the medical supplies for you by the time you come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。等你回来时，我会把药品准备好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this packet sniffer. It will allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Emily Ortal [0011904E] (file) Quest : ([0011A0C5]vfreeformlucky38) The Moon Comes Over the Tower EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion money, please.
Very well. Will there be anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to exchange NCR money for chips.
How many chips would you like?
I'd like to exchange Legion money for chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想用军团第纳尔来换筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many chips would you like?
Here's 500 caps.
Very much appreciated. These caps will go towards funding schools and other services to the poorer part of the community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感激不尽。我们会用这笔钱来资助学校，并且帮助城郊那些穷苦的人们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to exchange caps for chips.
How many chips would you like?
Why must Mr. House be killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么一定要杀死豪斯先生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he complicates the equation of force. He's a free agent, an unpredictable element.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他打破了势力间的均衡。他不受任何一方约束，是个不稳定因素。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he's trying to sit out this battle, just as he did four years ago, hoping the Legion and the Profligates will wipe each other out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定他这次还会像四年前一样作壁上观，盼着军团和荒淫之人两败俱伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he sees the Profligates losing this battle, however, he might throw his support behind them. Except he won't, because he'll be dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，如果这次荒淫之人输掉的话，他可能会派出援军。当然，假如他死了，我们就不必再操心了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Makes beeping sounds>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : Do not record. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Companion Protocol::Return Base>
Yeah, let's play again.
I hope you're ready for this.
No more magic spells this time.
I've got a good feeling about this hand.
Let's get this started!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jake Erwin [00112642] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. Let the game begin!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ambassador Dennis Crocker [00112640] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I would wish you luck, but of course peerless intellect is all that matters here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。祝你好运，但显然智力才是决定因素。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, hope you're ready to lose.
Let the Caravan Lesson begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我好好教你该怎么玩商队牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No-bark wins! A few more like that and the curse'll get lifted for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 疯嘴获胜！再来几次就能打破魔咒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take it to heart. I've studied the strategies of the masters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别太难过，我可是研究了不少大师的策略。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dang it! Shoulda known you was getting caravan hints from the bloatfly spirits what live in these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼！肯定是那些辐射蝇的幽灵帮你作弊了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I'll be cold and rotting before I let them get the best of me. Let's go again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，就算我进了棺材，也绝不能容许有人比我强。再来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. I wonder where I went wrong. Let's try that again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我究竟是哪里搞错了。我们再来一把好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit, I thought I had you there. Let's play again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我还以为我赢定了。再来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you're good. Give me another game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你玩得很好啊，再和我来一把。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to play a hand of Caravan?
Sure.
All right, let's see what you got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，看看你究竟有多大本事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ringo [00104C7C] (mod) NPC : Johnson Nash [000DA729] (file) NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) NPC : No-bark Noonan [0008CD23] (file) NPC : Quartermaster Mayes [00120DCE] (file) NPC : Poindexter [00104311] (mod) NPC : Jules [0013E307] (file) NPC : Ambassador Dennis Crocker [00112640] (file) NPC : Private Jake Erwin [00112642] (file) NPC : Melissa [000E595C] (mod) NPC : Klamath Bob [000F839E] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to roll over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你输得心服口服的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ringo [00104C7C] (mod) NPC : Johnson Nash [000DA729] (file) NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) NPC : No-bark Noonan [0008CD23] (file) NPC : Quartermaster Mayes [00120DCE] (file) NPC : Poindexter [00104311] (mod) NPC : Jules [0013E307] (file) NPC : Ambassador Dennis Crocker [00112640] (file) NPC : Private Jake Erwin [00112642] (file) NPC : Melissa [000E595C] (mod) NPC : Klamath Bob [000F839E] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's play.
A fellow enthusiast, huh? That's great! Let's play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也爱玩牌？太好了，来吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Old No-bark is always looking to play. Not for entertainment, mind you, but because if you look at the cards right you can know the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。老疯嘴可是很喜欢商队牌的。要知道，这可不是单纯的消遣，只要你能看出这些牌的门道，你就能预知未来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn straight I would! Let's see what you got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还用说？来看看你手气如何吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring it on, buddy!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Jake Erwin [00112642] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always have time for a good game of Caravan. I hope you're up to the challenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩商队牌我当然有空。就看你有没有本事和我较量一番了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ambassador Dennis Crocker [00112640] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A fascinating proposition. Naturally, my considerable genius makes me a master of the game, so try not to be disappointed if you lose miserably.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诱人的提议。以我的天赋，这种游戏根本不在话下。所以如果你输太惨，也没必要伤心哦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You betcha! Caravan's got me through many a long night before. I hope you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还用说！商队牌可是伴我度过了多少不眠夜啊。希望你准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you have what it takes, kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得自己牌技不错吗，小子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you wish.
Up for some more Caravan?
All right, go on - let's put our cards down.
I was hoping to pass the time with a game or two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想玩一两把牌，消磨下时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, Caravan? All right, I'll give it a go. Haven't exactly got much of a line of folks to serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？商队牌？好吧，我还真会玩。这附近懂得玩的人并不多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running low on Small Energy Cells. Can you make me more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的小型能量电池快用完了，你能帮我再做一些吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some Microfusion Cells. Can you make some?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些微型核聚变电池。可以制造一点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you repair my weapon?
<Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me access your multitools. I want to make something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我用用你的工具组，我想造点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Confirmatory beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make some ammo. Can you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要制造点弹药，能帮帮我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Confirmatory beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you drop the power output by .24, you'll be able to make more energy ammo with no quality loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你将功率输出降低0.24，你将能够在不损失质量的情况下制造更多能量弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you switched to the 3/8 wrench and the smaller drill, those weapon repairs would be easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改用3/8扳手和较小的钻头，武器修理起来会更容易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need energy cells right now - I'd like some satchel charges, ED-E.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不需要能量电池了 - 我需要一些炸药包，ED-E。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you make me some flamer fuel instead of energy cells?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我做点火焰喷射器燃料而不是能量电池吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove the safety catches on those Microfusion Cells and you could turn them into satchel charges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拔掉那些微型核聚变电池上的保险栓你就能把它们变成炸药包了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] <Happy beeping>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [04004CDA] (ID) NPC : ED-E [0010C769] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E0] (mod) NPC : ED-E [001694E2] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, if you strip out the plasma relays on those energy cells, you could make flamer fuel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，如果你卸掉那些能量电池的等离子继电器，你就能做出火焰喷射器燃料了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's trade equipment.
Exchange all my caps for chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的瓶盖都换成筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exchange all my Legion money for chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的军团货币都换成筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exchange all my NCR money for chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的NCR货币都换成筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是您的筹码。还有什么能为您效劳的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make a donation to the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给追随者们捐一笔钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much do you have to donate?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julie Farkas [0010C682] (file) Quest : ([060055AF]PWBVxVFreeformFollowersDonation) Followers Donation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 10 caps.
Thanks! Anything else?

Thanks for the donation. Every bit goes toward helping Freeside.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is unfortunate. If you change your mind, please see me right away.
